sholl

Class UPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • sholl.UPoint

  • public class UPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    'Universal Point' Class to access Cartesian coordinates of 2D and 3D points. Designed to accommodate points from several sources such SWC nodes, pixels, voxels, and ROIs.
    Author:
    Tiago Ferreira
